title: Puzzles Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 27 tracks of lovely, fluffy, bouncy audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything light and fun from puzzles to farming or nature-based games .


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The Puzzles Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is an eclectic pack of lively, fun and colourful tracks written for any project with a light and fluffy feel. Includes full tracks perfect for menus and in-game action plus short stings for Success and Failure.


PUZZLES MUSIC PACK - Overview

- NINE full tracks of fun, fluffy and energetic vibes: LISTEN HERE

- EIGHTEEN variations on the full tracks for variation and looping: LISTEN HERE and HERE


MAIN THEMES [each loopable theme comes with two variations + an ending sting for success and failure]

1 - ClackyPants - [01:34]

2 - FlickyBoo - [01:56]

3 - FloodleBug - [01:25]

4 - FluffyBounce - [01:58]

5 - FlumbleDum - [01:57]

6 - FuddleThump - [01:45]

7 - MumpleWizz - [02:28]

8 - NoodleFizz - [02:02]

9 - ZoomleZipp - [01:58]
technicalDetails:
Features:

- All tracks are FULLY LOOPABLE for total flexibility.

- SUCCESS and FAILURE stings for each main track. LISTEN HERE

- 52 Minutes of Fully Mastered tracks ready for import

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre


Number of Audio Wavs: 45

Number of Audio Cues: 45

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 52

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
